newsitem.title: FRANCE: French finance minister cuts growth forecast.
newsitem.headline: French finance minister cuts growth forecast.

text.p: French Finance Minister Jean Arthuis said on Thursday that the 1997 budget he was going to present in a few weeks time would be based on economic growth of between 2.25 percent and 2.5 percent.
This is less than the 2.5 to 2.8 percent GDP growth assumption he had taken previously.
